restaurantId.tooshort: Restaurant ID must have at least five characters.
restaurantId.invalid: Invalid ID. You can use only alphabets and numbers.

editCommon.copyAlert: Copy this restaurant and create it as a new private restaurant.

editCommon.copyMenuAlert: Copy this item to the restaurant as a new private item.

tax.taxExample: If set the price as {count} in the settings, will be shown as:

editRestaurant.enablePrelineDescription: Enable line breaks for the introduction, order notice, order thanks of  the restaurant and item description of menu
editRestaurant.taxPriceDisplayJp: Tax Included labeling is mandatory in Japan.
editRestaurant.preparationTimeDescription: Shortest time from order to takeaway
editRestaurant.searchMap: Set the location from the address
editRestaurant.enterAddress: Please enter an address to search
editRestaurant.businessHourDescription: Check the business day of the week and set the business hours. If you need to split your business hours, such as a break, please enter the latter time in the Another Hours form.
editRestaurant.draftWarning: You can publish this by correcting the red frame.
editRestaurant.updateMapDescription: Set restaurant location from your restaurant name and address.
editRestaurant.reallyDelete: Do you really want to delete this?
editRestaurant.reallyOnListDelete: Do you really want to delete this from lists?
editRestaurant.deliveryDescription: You can manage your own delivery. By setting the delivery area etc., the customer can choose takeout or delivery when ordering. (Don't forget to save if you have changed the store settings)
editRestaurant.printerDescription: You can print your order information using a printer made by Star Seiki connected via Bluetooth.
editRestaurant.phoneCallDescription: Make a call when a new order comes in
editRestaurant.phoneCallNotice: Although it is currently provided free of charge, this feature may be a paid feature in the future due to telephone call charges. In that case, even if this function is turned on, there is no sudden cost
editRestaurant.emailNotificationDescription: Send an email when a new order comes in
editRestaurant.emailNotificationNotice: If you can't find it in your inbox, please check your spam folder.
editRestaurant.acceptUserMessageNotice: Allows customers to enter a single message on the order confirmation screen.

editMenu.enterItemAliasesName: Please enter an alias for the item (e.g. foreign language)
editMenu.enterItemMemo: Memo (Memo will not be displayed on customer's page. Please do not write confidential information)
editMenu.pleaseAddItem: Please create your menu from the bottom button.
editMenu.itemAliasesName: Item Alias (This information is only displayed in the admin page.)
editMenu.itemOptionsNote: For altenatives, use comma to separate them (e.g., "Chicken, Pork, Tofu"). You may add a price to an option with (+N), where N is the price.
editMenu.itemInvalidMessage: This item is not on your menu because data is invalid.
editMenu.saveAsDraft: Save as draft. This item is not on your menus.
editMenu.reallyDelete: Do you really want to delete this?
editMenu.csvCategoriesNote: This is a category setting for use within the Excel file that can be downloaded from the Order History.

shopInfo.notPublic: Page is not public to users.
shopInfo.name: Restaurant name
shopInfo.temporaryClosureDescription: Please select a date and then press Add
shopInfo.deliveryThresholdNotice: Delivery is possible from orders totaling {price} or more.
shopInfo.deliveryAreaInfo: Details will be displayed on the next order page.
shopInfo.deliveryAreaRadius: Approximately within {radius} m from the restaurant
shopInfo.buttonDeliveryFeeThreshold: Can be delivered for {price} JPY or more

transactionsAct.title: Specified Commercial Transaction Act
transactionsAct.otherFeesDescription: You are responsible for any expenses related to transportation to and from the restaurant.
transactionsAct.paymentDescriptionCardNote: If an error occurs while payment procedures even though you selected online payment, we are sorry but please pay at the store.
transactionsAct.deliveryDescription: Customer's specified date and store pickup.
transactionsAct.cancellationDescription1: You can cancel your order on the Internet before the order state is Order Placed; After the state has changed, please contact the restaurant.
transactionsAct.cancellationDescription2: In the following cases, we may cancel the transaction related to your order and you are required to pay the amount equivalent to that price as a general rule.
transactionsAct.cancellationDescription3: In addition to the above, even accepted orders may be canceled due to material shortages, sell-outs, excessive orders, errors in order acceptance, or other reasons at the discretion of the member store. If you have already paid for the order, you may request a refund from the store, but you may not seek compensation for damages beyond the refund unless the store has committed intentional or gross negligence.
transactionsAct.cancellationDescription4: The order cannot be canceled after the Accepted message is displayed.
transactionsAct.cancellationDescription5: We may cancel the transaction related to your order.
transactionsAct.cancellationTakeoutDescription1: When 2 hours have elapsed after the Ready to Pickup message is displayed.
transactionsAct.cancellationDeliveryDescription1: If more than 5 minutes have passed since you arrived at the designated delivery location and you are unable to contact us.
transactionsAct.cancellationDeliveryDescription2: If more than 15 minutes have passed since arriving at the designated delivery location
transactionsAct.cancellationDeliveryDescription3: When a place that violates the provisions of these Terms is specified as a delivery place

sitemenu.limitedSale: Limited sale on the day of the week

lp.moTagline: FamilyMart's official layaway service that allows you to easily make purchases from your PC or smartphone.
lp.moDescription1: You can order products that we do not normally carry.
lp.moDescription2: You can pick up your order at the store in an hour at the earliest.

order.4digitsCVC: The four digits on the front

order.cancelOrderConfirm: Do you really want to cancel this order?
order.pleaseStay: Please stay on this page. The order status will be updated below.
order.pleasePayAtRestaurant: Online payment was not enabled yet. Please pay at the time of pickup.
order.sendSMS: Receive Text Messages (standard telco fee may apply)
order.notAvailable: This restaurant is not available at this time. Please try again later
order.enterMessage: You can send a message to the restaurant.

status.stripe_user_message_pending: (The card payment process has not been completed on the restaurant side)
status.stripe_user_message_confirmed: I have already paid by credit card.

receipt.explain1: You can view the receipt of Stripe's credit card payment
receipt.explain2: A new tab will open. If you can't open it, please allow it

order.lineMessage: If you add LINE Official Account as a friend, you will receive information directly from the restaurant.

delivery.alert: Before setting the delivery, first specify the location of the store on the map in the store settings

delivery.deliveryThreshold: Delivery can be accepted Total amount setting
delivery.preparationTimeNotice: Please enter the shortest time it will take for the customer to complete the delivery after placing the order.
delivery.setTheAddressInTheDeliveryLocation: Set  the address in the delivery destination
delivery.setTheAddressInTheDeliveryLocationDescri: * Calculate the distance between the store and the delivery destination.
delivery.deliveryFreeThresholdNotice: If the total price of the item exceeds this price, the delivery fee will be automatically set to 0 yen.
delivery.deliveryFeeSettingNotice: If you do not need a delivery fee, please set it to 0 yen.
delivery.deliveryThresholdNotice: If the total price of the item exceeds this price, we will be able to accept delivery.
delivery.setAreaMapNotice: Specify the approximate deliverable range in a circle centered on the store. This range is a guide, so please judge whether delivery is possible at the time of ordering and accept the order.

sms.notice: A SMS message will be sent for the verification.
sms.typeVerificationCode: Please type the code you've received
sms.auth/invalid-verification-code: The SMS verification code used to create the phone auth credential is invalid. Please resend the verification code sms and be sure use the verification code provided by the user.
sms.auth/missing-verification-code: The phone auth credential was created with an empty SMS verification code.

notes.title: Notes
notes.userRestaurantsBody: The restaurants you have added will not automatically appear on the list of restaurants for users. Please click the [Request to be Listed] button and your restaurant will be added to the list after approved.
notes.notificationSoundBody: Order notification sound will be played while viewing the order list page (not on this page). If you want to have multiple restaurant notifications playing at the same time, you need to be able to view the order list pages for each one. To do so, you will need a separate window on your computer and a separate device for your tablet.

messages.childInvitationMessage3: If you want to change to a sub-account that manages this restaurant, press Accept. If you want to decline, press Reject.
